SPELL_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() local effectController = EffectController() effectController:MarkSearchedLibrary() filter:Clear() filter:NotTargetted() filter:AddSupertype( SUPERTYPE_BASIC ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_LAND ) filter:May() filter:SetZone( ZONE_LIBRARY ) filter:SetPlayer( effectController ) effectController:ChooseTarget( NO_VALIDATION, "CARD_QUERY_CHOOSE_LAND_TO_PUT_ONTO_BATTLEFIELD", EffectDC():Make_Targets(0) )
local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if target ~= nil then target:PutIntoPlayTapped( EffectController() ) end
